title: Developing a Real-World Learning-Based Language Education Model for Engineering Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level engineering work experience and foundational language proficiency
context.additional_context: A course for in-service engineering professionals focusing on solving real-world work problems using language skills, offering a blended learning environment with digital tools and industry collaboration cases.

learning_goals: Learners can utilize domain-specific terminology relevant to real-world engineering scenarios with 90% accuracy.
Learners can solve real-world language communication problems through team-based projects in a blended environment.
Learners can derive at least three areas for improvement in language use through self-assessment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
